howItWorks.title: How It
howItWorks.description: Our platform brings together riders and drivers seamlessly – helping you book faster, travel safer, and reach your destination with ease and convenience.

step1.description: Enter your destination to instantly view available rides, upfront pricing, and estimated arrival times.

step2.description: Get matched with a nearby, background-checked driver. View their profile, vehicle details, and rating.

step3.description: Watch your driver arrive in real-time. Hop in and enjoy a safe, comfortable journey to your destination.

step4.description: Arrive safely and pay seamlessly. Rate your experience to help us maintain our high community standards.

features.title: Why Choose
features.feature1Desc: Never wonder where your ride is. With our precision GPS tracking, monitor your driver's exact location, route, and ETA in real-time. Share your trip status with loved ones for added security.
features.feature2Desc: Ride your way. Choose from Economy for everyday value, Comfort for extra room, or Luxury so you can arrive in style. Filter by price, vehicle size, and driver rating to match your exact needs.
features.feature3Desc: Pay your way, securely. Whether you prefer cash, credit card, or digital wallet, we've got you covered. Our encrypted payment system ensures every transaction is safe, transparent, and instant.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose

whyChooseUs.reason2Desc: From booking rides to tracking in real-time, secure payments, and managing your ride history.
whyChooseUs.reason3Desc: Access emergency assistance, share ride details with contacts, and enjoy 24/7 support — anytime, anywhere.
whyChooseUs.reason4Desc: We combine cutting-edge technology with trusted service to ensure your ride is both convenient and completely hassle-free.

faq.title: Frequently
faq.description: Find clear answers to the most common questions about booking rides, becoming a driver, or joining as a company on the Bourter platform.
faq.question1: How do I book a ride?
faq.answer1: It's simple. Open the Bourter app, enter your destination, and tap 'Request Ride'. You'll instantly see upfront pricing and be matched with the nearest available driver.
faq.answer2: Bourter prioritizes safety, transparency, and fairness. We rigorously vet our drivers, offer real-time tracking for every trip, and ensure competitive pricing for riders while providing better earnings for drivers.
faq.question3: Is the app free to download?
faq.answer3: Absolutely. The Bourter app is 100% free to download on both iOS and Android. You only pay for the rides you take, with no hidden subscription fees.
faq.question4: How do I sign up as a driver?
faq.answer4: Click 'Join as Driver' in the menu or download our Driver App. Fill in your details, upload your documents, and once verified, you can start accepting rides and earning immediately.
faq.answer5: The Company Panel is a powerful tool for fleet owners. It allows you to register your company, manage multiple drivers and vehicles, track daily earnings, and optimize your business operations from one dashboard.
